newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Mentor Graphics cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Mentor Graphics cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Doug Van Dorsten cut his rating on Mentor Graphics Corp to hold from strong buy after the company predicted lower-than-expected results for the September and subsequent quarters.
-- He cut his 1996 earnings projection to $0.60 a share from $1.08 and 1997 to $0.80 a share from $1.60.

-- Van Dorsten said weakness in the telecommunications industry, which is 40 percent of sales, caused most of the September shortfall. He added the company will likely build backlog, slowing the overall sales growth rate.
